= Add New Printer =

These are instructions for adding a printer to the prod or test server
to be used in iCaRas.

    1) Remote in to prod server (or test if adding to test)
    2) Add a printer, with IP address, to the server
    3) Give it a name
    4) If needed, [[./change_printer|change or set printer]] in iCaRas
